optionsT Struct Reference

#include <gfs-options.h>

Detailed Description

Command line options data structure.

This data structure is used from the program in order to keep, organize the command line options. Also, is used when we want to check the options.

Definition at line 39 of file gfs-options.h.

Field Documentation

Print verbose messages variable.

This variable is used in order to explain what is being done.
